Blog.post: after a long weekend of SFA im exausted and ready to go back to work, it think the only thing i've 'accomplished' this weekend is the setting up of a new windows 2003 with exchange / weboutlook 2003 (which is REALLY shiny) other then that its been a boring weekend. On the bright side my lady friend returns in 6 days!

Somthing that REALLY makes me mad you pay like 50+ bucks for 'high speed' internet... which is usually barely faster speed internet. my god this is worse than the 'safer' sex bullshit. My good friend from Ohio Steve, cannot run a webserver because his isp blocks port 80 in hopes that he will pay THEM to host his website on their itty bitty 10 mb webhosting package! pure bologNA! ok im done for now.

it's been brought to my attention that quotes arent funny without the comics SO heres what im gonna do! http://www.sinfest.net/d/20000530.html http://www.sinfest.net/d/20000530.html and of course the adventures of WASABI Ninja Pimp! http://www.sinfest.net/d/20000626.html http://www.sinfest.net/d/20010302.html http://www.sinfest.net/d/20010504.html and near my favorite one http://www.sinfest.net/d/20010808.html
another goofy quote from sinfest, "i now pronounce you DOM and SUB, you may not SMACK dat bitch up!"

After takeing my vitamines i have decided that calcium pills suck. just for kicks ... ya i was bored i measure it ... each pill is an inch long and like 2cm thick wtf.... did i buy these at a pet food store or something? Anyhow i was victim to a senseless act of KINDNESS today .... i transfer over 20 bucks to my checkings account cause i cant buy stuff from my savings on debit.... go to this store for a pizza sub and jolt but loe and behold even though i transfered this 20 i had insuff funds for 11 bucks! So the point of the story, i was like damn this sucks, offer to put the items back in the fridge for the nice lady and shes like meh just come by tomorrow an pay we know your good for it! so that made my nights and now my gut is full of jolt and pizzasub goodness!
seven letter word for senstitive..... whipped
Lifes a bitch ... true true, but shes MY bitch
Nothing incredibly new cept a new hilarious comic i found at http://www.sinfest.net

Ok, yesterday was like the most beautiful monday i've ever seen. So today we get some punishment, coldness and shitty rain and a little bit of crappy wind for good measure. So due to this dramatic weather change i feel all groggy and sleepy but i cannot sleep did not sleep. Today has a rather high probability of sucking. we'll see! ... ug
urlLink My First Picture posting in a blog. yay... and stuff. urlLink

Well I'll be i can now post within Gaim how cool is that, kudos to whoever made this pluggin, my god talk about easy to use. phht ill usse nothin else now WOOT. well so ends monday, my pilot lite went out on my stove and made it smell real bad in here thought i was gonna blow up the house, eventually figured out how to lite a pilot lite. learned a bit about gas things and now my house is 'safe'. Tomorrows another day at work god knows what chaos a long weekend has brought guess i'll see!

What an un eventful frickn weekend .. i went out for coffee and bought some food for cookn later, wtf. ah well i suppose i get to hear about everyones kick ass weekends tomorrow, whatever. Its been relaxing so relaxn might go brew me another pot of coffee... jolt.. bawls... xtc other wierd energy drinks still aint got nothing on the black tar that is coffee.

This is amazing after messing around on the net looking for a stupid song (id ont know why i just didnt wanna sleep) i found Dungeons And Dragons 3.5 every book for it in PDF format WOOT! We'll see if they are legit in the morning. I own em all already but now i can use my laptop as a dm shield thingy its gonna rock, ya or not. friday turned out great saturday is looking good.

Someone Egged the car again! ok this is beginning to piss me off, im going to camp out there with a paintball gun and pelt the fuckers, this is really getting on my nerves and for once in a long time i bear someone some serious ill will.

Oky doke, not buzzing anymore, comming off the high ... really tired .... server is up again, apache webserver enabled with SSL and other wierd encryption things to protect my non existant data better than most banks. what a waste ah well my work is my play but my play is work. so do i ever stop playing to work or working to play? note to self resume other hobbies. oh yeah all these lil blog things were made possible by ME, blogger.com and a cool application that posts this stuff real easily called BLOGBUDDY you can get it from sourceforge.net and searching for blogbuddy. ... ug im tired

Update on that bawls stuff, after 3 and a half bottles i got one hell of a caffien buzz goin but well ... im kinda sleepy... only kinda guess that means drink more. i should save em for friday when id otn have to work and suffer a burn out ... btw this shit is addictive beware!

So i heard about this drink called BAWLS, friend jay hates it he spat it out the first sip haha.. anyhow the stuff is great tasteing and doesnt have a crappy coala after taste kinda tastes like berries.

Ok, last night before i went to bed, i set my alarm at 7am.... this is normal, its 12 mid night right now. I go to sleep. My alarm sets off at 1am. I hear a very destinct strange sound come from my living room like someone put down a bag of chips. I search the house.... nothing. My jolt cola ... was full, i swore i drank the fucking thing, not only that it wasnt in front of my monitor anymore it was with the empties. Feeling all haunted like i just place a pencil on the paper holding it close my eyes blank my mind, will whoevers there to write ..... it said CORY. im scared now. i know a cory now im wonderin if shes alright or maybe just maybe i've lost it ... into some paranoid dillusion. In closing Garfield had the right idea no more pizza subs after midnight!!!

well thanks to my blundering through settings and reading a bit here and there i managed to figure out some streaming settings, why the hell arent the streaming settings in the setup of a new page? oh well it matters not the blog works. Forgive me whoever is reading for this is my first blog. Here you will find many interesting and boring thing. Here you will find many sane and insane things. Here is my piece of mind, my little corner in the expansive internet.... everyone should have one! .... ok thats it here goes ... publish post!

Well im 24 now , not feeling any younger or older. Not quite a quarter of a century old. Still no internet at home. No phone, which is a blessing i figure .... i have pager if anyone important needs to get me. ah well things are looking up .... I think ... more to come in the near future i might sell my house! Rob drink coffee its good for you
